name: listqualifiedtoarray
description: Copies the elements of a list to an array.

params.name: delimiter
params.description: a single character that separate list elements.

params.name: qualifier
params.description: a single character before and after the list elements.

params.name: qualifierRequired
params.description: if set to true, all values need to have qualifier (quotes) around them.

params.name: includeEmptyFields
params.description: if set to true, empty values are included as well
